message: Let's start fair. I'll take the lion's share this time, but we can negotiate in the future.
That's a very uneven split you proposed! How about this one? It accounts for the fact that the value diminishes for you in the next round.
Okay, I see your point about the diminishing value.  Let's split the difference this time.  If you agree, we can work toward a more even split in the future.
